Actors: Michelle Williams, Eddie Redmayne, Julia Ormond, Kenneth Branagh
Title: My Week with Marilyn
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 59 nominations.
Plot: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier's, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957).
